name: CatGun
description:
Premise

In a not-so-far-away Wild West, there is a certain legendary cat cowboy. His name is... CatGun. And he is tasked with a very special task today...

Controls
A and D to move left / right. Space to jump. Left mouse click to navigate through dialogue.

Misc. Note

A game made for Hero, in Secret Santa Jam.

While I have included Mac and Linux build for your convenience, please note that I cannot provide support for those builds.
